title: Compile error related THLongStorage
body_html:
I'm using Ubuntu 17.10 beta with GCC 7.2, pyenv python 3.6.2. I've got a installation error like this:

https://gist.github.com/colesbury/82a526b8d3ecb46aaf8988c0e0a0043d

I've inserted #include <functional> in torch/csrc/jit/ir.h to eliminate some errors related to std::function. This modification wasn't required on the machine with GCC 4.8.5
body_text:

body:
I'm using Ubuntu 17.10 beta with GCC 7.2, pyenv python 3.6.2. I've got a installation error like this:

https://gist.github.com/colesbury/82a526b8d3ecb46aaf8988c0e0a0043d

I've inserted ```#include <functional>``` in ```torch/csrc/jit/ir.h``` to eliminate some errors related to ```std::function```. This modification wasn't required on the machine with GCC 4.8.5
